name.description: The name of the Azure Analysis Services server to create. Server name must begin with a letter, be lowercase alphanumeric, and between 3 and 63 characters in length.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___enablePowerBIService.description: The value indicating whether to enable Power BI access

___rangeStart.description: The start of the IP address range (inclusive)

___rangeEnd.description: The end of the IP address range (inclusive)

___querypoolConnectionMode.description: The query pool connection mode for AS server

___serverMonitorMode.description: The server monitor mode for AS server

___managedMode.description: The managed mode of the server (0 = not managed, 1 = managed).

___gatewayDetails.description: The details of the gateway associated with the server

___dmtsClusterUri.description: The cluster uri of the data movement service

___gatewayResourceId.description: The resource id of the azure gateway resource

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
The SKU (pricing tier) of the Analysis Services instance.

___capacity.description: The total number of query replica scale-out instances.
